column4: something is wrong with my panel, when i press the CLOSE button on any window like pidgin, it quits entirely instead of being there in the panel, what do i do ?
that's what the close button is supposed to do : close it... pidgin should still be in the systrau, yhough
but it should be there in the panel next to the time,right ?
yes, that's called the system tray. whixh environment are you using ?
